DOC.brief_summary: Assess the association of copy number variation (CNV) and inflammatory cytokine with the risk of dementia.
DOC.brief_title: Copy Number Variations, Inflammatory Cytokines and the Risk of Dementia
DOC.detailed_description: This is a hospital-based case-control study. We plan to assess the association of CNV and inflammatory cytokine with the risk of dementia. Hopefully to find some genetic biomarkers to identify the risk of dementia at an early stage.
DOC.criteria: hospital recruited dementia patients and controls
